I.name: Second Skin
description: {{sbc|Innate - Living Weapon:}} Upon gaining a set amount of permanent [[Champion statistic|stats]] from [[item]]s and {{tt|stat growth|Includes all stats gained when leveling (including base AD gained), but does not include stats at level 1.}}, '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve the related [[champion ability|basic ability]] after being in [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.

{{sbc|Innate - Plasma:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} apply [[stack]]s of {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} to enemies that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent stacks and stacks up to 4 times. Her and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects and {{tip|polymorph|polymorphs}} against enemy {{tip|champions}} will also apply {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Caustic Wounds:}} {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} stacks applied by '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attacks or {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} deal {{as|{{pp|4 to 16 for 7|1;3;6;9;11;14;17}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|1 to 8 for 5|1;4 to 16|changedisplay=true}} per Plasma stack before application)|buzzword}} {{as|(+ {{pp|15 to 25 for 5|0 to 4|key=%|type=Plasma stacks before application|changedisplay=true}} AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. Her next stack against a target with {{as|4 Plasma|buzzword}} will instead consume them to deal an additional {{as|15% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health|health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 400 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Living Weapon: Upon gaining a set amount of permanent Champion statistic from items and stat growth, Kai'Sa can evolve the related champion ability after being in Channel#Casting Times for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
Innate - Plasma: Kai'Sa's basic attacks on-hit and Kai'Sa's Void Seeker apply stacks of Plasma to enemies that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent stacks and stacks up to 4 times. Her and nearby allies' immobilizing effects and polymorphs against enemy champions will also apply Plasma.
Innate - Caustic Wounds: Plasma stacks applied by Kai'Sa's basic attacks or Kai'Sa's Void Seeker deal 1;3;6;9;11;14;17 ‒ undefined (+ 1;4 to 16 ‒ undefined per Plasma stack before application) (+ 0 to 4 ‒ undefined AP) bonus magic damage. Her next stack against a target with 4 Plasma will instead consume them to deal an additional 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, capped at 400 against monsters.

Q1.name: Icathian Rain
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemies, each one hitting their target after {{fd|0.4}} seconds and dealing {{as|physical damage}}. {{tip|Minions}} below {{sti|health|{{as|35% health}}}} take double damage.
Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires {{ft|{{sti|{{as|{{pp|round=ceil|100-{{ccd|Kai'Sa|dam_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} attack damage}}}} from items|{{sti|{{as|100 attack damage}}}} from items and stat growth}} to upgrade – ''Icathian Rain'' instead fires 12 missiles.
''A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability.''
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby visible enemies, each one hitting their target after 0.4 seconds and dealing physical damage. Minions below 35% health take double damage.
Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.
Kai'Sa's Living Weapon: Requires to upgrade – Icathian Rain instead fires 12 missiles.
A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Missile|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
Q1.notes:
* The first missile on a target applies {{tip|area damage}}, while the rest on the same target apply {{tip|persistent area damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} only block the damage from a single missile.
* ''Icathian Rain'' acquires its targets upon cast. Moving will not change its targets.
* Charging {{ai|Supercharge|Kai'Sa}} will not stop the missiles from firing.
* It takes 1 second for all missiles to fire at a single target.

effects.str: • Physical Damage Per Missile: (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)

• Reduced Damage Per Missile: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % AP)
  • Total Single-Target Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % AP)
• Total Evolved Single-Target Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % AP)

W1.name: Void Seeker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' fires a void bolt in the target direction that grants {{tip|sight}} around its trajectory as it travels, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit, applying {{as|2 Plasma|buzzword}}, and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires {{sti|{{as|100 ability power}}}} from [[items]] to upgrade – ''Void Seeker'' applies {{as|3 Plasma|buzzword}} instead and {{sti|cdr|reduces}} its cooldown by 77% if it hits an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
W1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa fires a void bolt in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit, applying 2 Plasma, and revealing them for 4 seconds.
Kai'Sa's Living Weapon: Requires 100 ability power from items to upgrade – Void Seeker applies 3 Plasma instead and reduces its cooldown by 77% if it hits an enemy champion.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 130% AD) (+ 45% AP)

E1.name: Supercharge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' charges up over the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''bonus''' attack speed|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed.}}|as}}.
After completing the cast, '''Kai'Sa''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and her {{tip|attack windup|basic attack windup}} percentage is reduced to {{fd|6.44%}} for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires{{ft|{{sti|as|{{as|{{pp|round=ceil|key=%|100-{{ccd|Kai'Sa|as_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} attack speed}}}} from items|{{sti|{{as|100% attack speed}}}} from items and stat growth}}to upgrade – ''Supercharge'' grants {{tip|invisibility}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa charges up over the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes ghosted and gains bonus movement speed, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
After completing the cast, Kai'Sa gains bonus attack speed and her basic attack windup percentage is reduced to 6.44% for 4 seconds.
Supercharge's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds on-attack.
Kai'Sa's Living Weapon: Requiresto upgrade – Supercharge grants invisibility for 0.5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Movement Speed|{{ap|55 to 75}}%|Maximum Movement Speed|{{ap|55*2 to 75*2}}%}}
E1.notes:
* Her attack commands during this time are switched to movement commands instead. Upon finishing the charge and if an attack command was issued, '''Kai'Sa''' will continue walking toward her target.
** '''Kai'Sa''' behaves normally if attack move click was issued not on a target during the cast time, stopping at attack range of the closest target and starts attacking when charged up.

effects.str:
• Minimum Movement Speed: %
  • Maximum Movement Speed: %

R.name: Killer Instinct
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' instantly {{tip|shields}} herself for 2 seconds and swiftly {{tip|dashes}} to a target location near a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion {{tt|recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}|4 seconds after it's stacked or ruptured}}. The shield's duration refreshes once the dash ends.
''Killer Instinct'' {{tip|Basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attack timer.
'''Kai'Sa''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Killer Instinct''.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa instantly shields herself for 2 seconds and swiftly dashes to a target location near a visible enemy champion recently affected by Plasma. The shield's duration refreshes once the dash ends.
Killer Instinct resets Kai'Sa's basic attack timer.
Kai'Sa can cast any of her abilities during Killer Instinct.
R.notes:
* '''Kai'Sa''' will issue a movement command to the targeted location regardless of whether the target location is valid. The dash is not buffered during this movement command. '''Kai'Sa''' will not dash if the targeted location becomes valid by walking in range or a nearby enemy champion becomes affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.
** If the targeted location is not valid, the range indicator will glow.
* The enemy champion recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} must be in range of '''Kai'Sa''' for the targeted location to be valid, and not the targeted location itself.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ % AD) (+ 90% AP)
